items.content: Pattakkaaran:- naam ellaavarum praarththhichu kartthaavinodu karunayum dayavum yaachikkanam.
Janam:- kaarunyavaanaaya kartthaave! Nyangallodu karu na cheythu nyangalle sahaayikkaname.
Pattakkaaran:- sthuthiyum sthothravum, praabhavavum puka zhchayum, maanyupokaattha nalla unnathiyum, ellaa yppozhum idavidaathe karettuvaan nyangall yogyaraa yittheeraname.

Uyirtthezhunnelpu moolam shathrukkalle odikkukayum, jeevichezhunnelpu moolam kurishil tharachavare lajippi kkayum, samaadhaanatthaal shishyanmaare aanandippikkayum, mukhadarshanatthaal shleehanmaare sthhirappedutthukayum, bhootha latthil svanta upadeshatthe vithaykkukayum cheytha, paraakramiyaaya mashihaathampuraanu sthuthi. Moonnaammani neratthe praarththhanayude ee samayatthum sakala peru nnaallukallilum nerangallilum, naazhikakallilum, kaalanga llilum nyangall jeevanodukoodiyirikkunna divasangalli lokkeyum sthuthiyum bahumaanavum aaraadhanayum ninakku yogyamaakunnu. Bkulahoon yaumoso dhaa yaayin lolmmeen.

Pattakkaaran:- krpayaal nyangalle daivikaraakkittheerppaa naayittu manushyasneham moolam manushyanaayittheernna maha tthvamulllla vachanamaaya daivavum, thiruvishdatthaal thaazhnna ykkaayi irangivannappoll srashdaavaayirikkunna sthhithiyilninnu svashakthi kurayukayo, nyangallkku vendi manushyanaayittheernnappoll athyunnathamaaya thante daivathvam vyathyaasappedukayo, nyangallkkuvendi nyangallude saadrsham dharichappoll svantapoornnathayude adhikaaratthe nashippikkayo, vyaapaaraprakaaram loka tthinte ullllil marichavaneppole kaanappettappoll aadiyum antavumillaattha svayasaaraamshatthil ninnu bheda ppedukayo cheyyaathirunna srashdaavum kolayil simhampole madinyukidannu adimappettirunna adima kkaare prakaashatthilekku purappeduvicha yoddhaavum, kashdaanubhavatthaal dushdane veezhikkukayum maranatthaal maranatthe kollukayum, kabaradakkatthaal marichupoya var thanne grahikkukayum, jeevichezhunnelpaal jeeva nullllavarkku vellippedukayum cheytha kashdathayillaattha vanum aayirikkunna daivamaaya mashihaa! Nyangall ninno dapekshikkunnu. Ninte jeevichezhunnelpu pravartthi chittulllla athbhuthakaaryangallil sookshichu nokkuvaan nyangallude manonayanangalle prakaashippikkaname. Nyangallkkuvendiyulllla ninte sahaayangallkku pakara maayi ellaa neravum sthothram cheyyunna nalla niroopa navum, nyangallodulllla ninte snehatthinuvendi ellaa pozhum balikallum vedippulllla sthothravum ana ykkunna vichaaravum, ninte karunayude valiya bahuthvammoolam nyangallkku sampaadichu tharaname. Ninnekkurichulllla arivinte prakaashatthinkathirukalle ninnilninnu nyangall kaikkolllluvaanaayittu nyangall ellaa neravum sthothratthode mahatthvamulllla ninte vaathiluka llilkoodi ninte vishuddhapraakaarangallilekku praveshikka yum, ninte krpayude mahaayogyathayulllla mahatthva tthinbhaagyatthil aanandikkayum cheyyumaaraakaname. Entukondennaal nee nallavanum manushyasnehamulllla vanum aakunnu. Nyangall ninakkum ninte pithaavinum, ninte vishuddha roohaaykkum, ennekkum sthuthiyum sthothravum karettunnu. Hosho
Pattakkaaran:- daivatthil ninnu kadangallkku parihaaravum paapangallkku mochanavum randulokangallilum ennekkum naam kaikkollllumaaraakatte.

content:
Onnaam naallaam ee nyaayarnaall Daivam than
agrajaathan thaan jeevichittee
Lokarkkellaam agrajanaada'tthe jeevi-
Ppichetti thaa-thangkal than koode,
He! Aadaamin suthare! Ningalle veendonaam
Aadaamudayo?-naayu sthothram cheyvin.

1. Nyangall than kartthaave! Nee
Kaarunyam cheyu nyangallmel;
Svaathantryam nyangallkkuththhaa-
Natthaal thannonaam puthraa!

2 ee nyaayarnaall naamaashaa-
Dhairyangall poondoraayi,
Uyironuththhaanam cheythu;
Kurishichor lajichallo.

3. Vandinamaam nyaayarnaallil
Kabareennuththhaanam cheythu;
Uyareppoyu than thaathante
Valabhaagatthaayallo thaan.

4. Nyangall than kartthaave! Nee
Kaarunyam cheyu nyangallmel
Svaathantryam nyangallkkuthaa-
Natthaal thannonaam puthraa!

5. Adiyaare uththhaanatthaal
Rakshichonaam mashihaa nee
nalkeedenam punyam nya-
Ngallkkum vaangippoyorkkum.
